Token.Abstract: The RKTestHelpers class provides a number of helpful utility methods for use in unit or integration tests for RestKit applications.
Stubs the route with the given class and method with a given path pattern.

Parameter.Name: objectClass
Parameter.Abstract: The class of the route to stub.

Parameter.Name: method
Parameter.Abstract: The method of the route to stub.

Parameter.Name: pathPattern
Parameter.Abstract: The path pattern to return instead in place of the current route's value.

Parameter.Name: nilOrObjectManager
Parameter.Abstract: The object manager to stub the route on. If nil, the shared object manager be be used.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The new stubbed route object that was added to the route set of the target object manager.

Token.Abstract: Stubs the route with the given name with a given path pattern.

Parameter.Name: routeName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the route to stub.

Parameter.Name: pathPattern
Parameter.Abstract: The path pattern to return instead in place of the current route's value.

Parameter.Name: nilOrObjectManager
Parameter.Abstract: The object manager to stub the route on. If nil, the shared object manager be be used.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The new stubbed route object that was added to the route set of the target object manager.

Token.Abstract: Stubs the relationship route for a given class with a given path pattern.

Parameter.Name: relationshipName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the relationship to stub the route of.

Parameter.Name: objectClass
Parameter.Abstract: The class of the route to stub.

Parameter.Name: pathPattern
Parameter.Abstract: The path pattern to return instead in place of the current route's value.

Parameter.Name: nilOrObjectManager
Parameter.Abstract: The object manager to stub the route on. If nil, the shared object manager be be used.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The new stubbed route object that was added to the route set of the target object manager.

Token.Abstract: Finds all registered fetch request blocks matching the given path pattern and adds a new fetch request block that returns the same value as the origin block that matches the given relative string portion of a URL object.

Parameter.Name: pathPattern
Parameter.Abstract: The path pattern that matches the fetch request blocks to be copied.

Parameter.Name: relativeString
Parameter.Abstract: The relative string portion of the NSURL objects that the new blocks will match exactly.

Parameter.Name: nilOrObjectManager
Parameter.Abstract: The object manager to stub the route on. If nil, the shared object manager be be used.

Token.Abstract: Disables caching by setting a new [NSURLCache sharedURLCache] instance in which the memory and disk limits have been set to zero.
Creates, stores, and returns a NSCachedURLResponse object containing an NSHTTPURLResponse for the given request with a 200 (OK) status code.

Parameter.Name: request
Parameter.Abstract: The request to cache the response for.

Parameter.Name: responseData
Parameter.Abstract: The response data to be stored in the cache.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The cached URL response that was stored to the cache.

Token.Abstract: Creates, stores, and returns a NSCachedURLResponse object containing an NSHTTPURLResponse for the given URL and HTTP method with the given response data and a 200 (OK) status code.

Parameter.Name: URL
Parameter.Abstract: The URL to cache the response for.

Parameter.Name: HTTPMethod
Parameter.Abstract: The HTTP method of the request (i.e. 'GET', 'POST', 'PUT', 'PATCH', or 'DELETE').

Parameter.Name: responseData
Parameter.Abstract: The response data to be stored in the cache.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The cached URL response that was stored to the cache.
